Functional_Role: Rapid estrogen signaling; memory enhancement; neuroprotection; OXT neuron regulation; lordosis via ARH; GnRH modulation; anxiogenic; CCK satiety signaling
Notes: Well-established membrane ER; Kd ~3nM; activates Gαs→cAMP, PI3K/Akt, MAPK/ERK; high in OXT neurons; controversy over direct vs indirect E2 binding

Functional_Role: Rapid lordosis modulation; LH surge regulation; μ-opioid receptor internalization; neuronal excitability
Notes: Palmitoylation at Cys451 (mouse) essential for membrane targeting; requires caveolin-1 and DHHC-7/21; C451A knockin causes female infertility; transactivates mGluR1a

Functional_Role: Testosterone-induced apoptosis; hippocampal synaptic plasticity; learning/memory via ERK1/2 and eIF4E; dendritic spine density
Notes: NOVEL (2014); only zinc transporter with steroid receptor activity; Kd ~14nM; DHT has <1% T affinity; unique zinc-steroid signaling crosstalk; mediates androgen effects in Tfm mice

Functional_Role: Non-genomic testosterone effects; testosterone negative feedback on LH; energy metabolism; insulin secretion
Notes: Class C GPCR; multiligand receptor (also binds osteocalcin, amino acids, Ca²⁺); GPRC6A-null mice show feminization, low T; activates Gαs→cAMP→ERK

Functional_Role: GnRH secretion modulation; neuroprotection; anti-apoptotic; lordosis (VTA); oocyte maturation
Notes: Most characterized mPR; coupled to Gi→↓cAMP; works with PGRMC1 for membrane localization; controversy over true GPCR status

Functional_Role: Neurite outgrowth; neuroprotection; lordosis (VTA); GnRH suppression
Notes: Brain-specific expression; coupled to Gi; may have only 6 TMDs; required with mPRα for lordosis

Functional_Role: Ciliary activity regulation; putative reproductive functions
Notes: Less characterized; highest expression in hypothalamus

Functional_Role: Neuroprotection; anti-apoptotic neurosteroid actions; neuronal survival during starvation
Notes: BRAIN-SPECIFIC mPR; only mPR exclusively expressed in CNS; coupled to Gs (opposite to mPRα/β/γ); also binds allopregnanolone

Functional_Role: Potential anti-apoptotic neurosteroid actions; oocyte maturation
Notes: Coupled to Gs; less characterized; high pituitary expression

Functional_Role: Neuroprotection; neurosteroid synthesis regulation; anti-inflammatory (suppresses TNFα); water homeostasis/edema reduction; BDNF release
Notes: Well-established; may be identical to sigma-2 receptor; direct P4 binding debated; functions as adaptor for mPRα membrane localization; single TMD, cytochrome b5-related

Functional_Role: Neuroprotection in ischemic stroke; cytochrome P450 regulation
Notes: Does NOT bind P4 directly (confirmed); binds heme; inflammatory suppressor via NFκB; structurally similar to PGRMC1

Functional_Role: GnRH secretion modulation; neuroprotection; anti-apoptotic; lordosis (VTA); oocyte maturation
Notes: Most characterized mPR; coupled to Gi→↓cAMP; works with PGRMC1 for membrane localization; controversy over true GPCR status
